document_data.name: Madja Djiid
document_data.mainbody:
'''Madja Djiid''' was a commander and [[bloodforge]] mage in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]–[[657 DR]]).

When a ruler of [[Edenvale]] passed away without an heir, the [[Legendary Campaign]] leader marched on [[Edenvale Castle]] to claim the throne. Madja Djiid contested this, and the two fought a [[bloodforge]] battle outside Edenvale Castle.
